name: EssentialAlgos
description: EssentialAlgos is a curated collection of my personal approaches and solutions to popular coding challenges from platforms like LeetCode, HackerRank, CodeByte, and more. Each solution isn't just an answer, but a journey of problem-solving and critical thinking, laid out for clarity and deeper understanding.
author: willshepp28 <willsheppard29@gmail.com>
